# Flutter Android Calculator App

This is a Flutter calculator application for Android with basic arithmetic operations.

## Project Setup

- Flutter SDK required
- Android SDK configured via Android Studio or command line
- Dart language for development

## Key Features

- Basic calculator operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
- Clear and delete functionality
- Responsive UI design
- Material Design components

## Development

- Use Flutter hot reload for rapid development: `flutter run`
- Build APK: `flutter build apk --release`
- Run tests: `flutter test`

## Project Structure

- `/lib/main.dart` - Main entry point
- `/lib/screens/` - Screen components
- `/lib/widgets/` - Reusable widgets
- `/pubspec.yaml` - Dependencies and project configuration
